scripts.flatten: truffle-flattener contracts/TAPSToken.sol > flatten-contracts/TAPSToken.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/TAPSMasterChef.sol > flatten-contracts/TAPSMasterChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/TAPSMasterChefV2.sol > flatten-contracts/TAPSMasterChefV2.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/TAPSLottery.sol > flatten-contracts/TAPSLottery.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/Timelock.sol > flatten-contracts/Timelock.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/SmartChef.sol > flatten-contracts/SmartChef.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/TAPSLottery.sol > flatten-contracts/TAPSLottery.sol && truffle-flattener contracts/LotteryNFT.sol > flatten-contracts/LotteryNFT.sol && node flatten_fix.js
